synopsis.p: Maps elements according to a tab-separated mapping file.

description.p: reads the tab-separated mapping file and maps the elements specified by the expression . The mapping key of the elements is specified by the expression evaluated as a string with the element as the context. The key is mapped agains the column of specified by (starting at 0). Each feature in is set with the value of the corresponding column in the matched line.

param-doc.name: targetFeatures
param-doc.p: Name of the features where to store the columns of matched lines.

param-doc.name: keyColumn
param-doc.p: Index of the line key in .
